title: I met a nice girl at the car repair shop
body:
I needed service on my vehicle so while I was waiting for it I was watching terminator 2 on my laptop 

She comes in and says her battery is dead and needs a new one. She gives the guy her info and i overhear it 

so when she sits down she asks "is that terminator 2" 

i say yea. Then i ask her if shes from north carolina because she gave the guy a 919 area code which is north carolina. Then we talk for a bit and I go back to watching t2

my repair bill was aroudn 400 bux
